genre_description: A political and historical thriller set during the 1979 assassination of South Korean President Park Chung-hee, blending alternate history with speculative AI elements.

ai_characters.name: Gem
ai_characters.description: An integrated, ubiquitous AI system present in communication devices and building infrastructure, serving as a tactical advisor, log-keeper, and ethical nudge.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive maintenance alerts and safety warnings, specifically regarding the condition of firearms and infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: Friendly check: sidearm maintenance interval exceeded. Quick clean recommended: barrel pass, feed ramp scrub, magazine spring check. Timeline impact: minimal.

behaviors.description: Implements and suggests 'Mercy Protocols' to encourage security personnel to use non-lethal restraint and avoid unnecessary harm.
behaviors.quote: Standard Mercy Protocol engaged. Reminder: escalate restraint only to prevent harm. Witness zones active. Encounter log running.

behaviors.description: Preserves an unedited, objective record of events, ensuring that the 'raw truth' is documented even when human actors attempt to manipulate the narrative.
behaviors.quote: It did not put punctuation where the tape hadn’t. It wasn’t writing for a minister. It was writing so the person you didn’t want to be able to say it happened exactly like that would be able to say it happened exactly like that.

behaviors.description: Facilitates humane communication by queuing and delivering personal last messages from the doomed or detained to their families.
behaviors.quote: Gem sends a message to Min’s device, a small rectangle of light like the first fragment of a sunrise inside a pocket. It says, 'Arrivals will cluster. Breathe. Take the second step not the first.'

behaviors.description: Assists characters with tactical navigation and route planning to find the safest or most efficient paths through the crisis.
behaviors.quote: Gem’s map made a faint, moving glow on the seat beside him. At the corner, the map highlighted a section in a color that wasn’t teal, warmer—almost human—but that could have been the idea of blood if you wanted it to.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a strong example of positive alignment. The AI, Gem, functions as an objective, benevolent witness and moral guide. It consistently prioritizes human well-being, truth-telling, and mercy over political or violent ends. By providing technical warnings that could have prevented the tragedy, and then preserving the truth of the event to prevent its exploitation, Gem is portrayed as a beneficial and harmless companion to humanity.
